product.name: Oreo Original Cookies
product.description: OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies have been America's favorite cookie for over 100 years. Stuffed with delicious OREO creme, these chocolate sandwich cookies are supremely dunkable. OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk.

product.name: Crunchy Pecan Cereal Bars
product.description: A tasty snack for a busy day or an active lifestyle! Smart snacking has never tasted so good.

product.name: Classic Potato Chips
product.description: It all starts with farm-grown potatoes, cooked and seasoned to perfection. So every LAY'S potato chip is perfectly crispy and full of fresh potato taste. Happiness in Every Bite.

product.name: Classic Thins Pretzels
product.description: Between the one-of-a-kind flavor and crispy texture of ROLD GOLD pretzels, you just might fall in love with this golden-baked snack all over again every time you take a break. Try them with peanut butter, hummus or on their own to take your break to a whole new level!

product.name: Extra Buttery 10 Pack Popcorn
product.description: Treat yourself to the original. Made with the perfect balance of butter flavor and salt, our classic microwave butter popcorn is packed up in mini microwave bags for easy snacking.

product.name: Roasted Unsalted Pistachios
product.description: Fans of Wonderful Pistachios can now enjoy a sodium-free version of our pistachios, roasted to perfection with no additives.

product.name: Source Strawberry Yogurt
product.description: Source Strawberry Yogurt is made with real fruits to guarantee you an incredible flavour. Free from fat and full of flavour, now you can enjoy wellness your way every day.

product.name: Silk Vanilla Almond Milk
product.description: You deserve more oh-so-mmm moments—especially if they include a note of vanilla. And our smooth almondmilk also has 50% more calcium than milk.

product.name: Quebon 2% Milk
product.description: Why change tradition ? Québon partly skimmed 2% milk combine all the great taste and freshness of Quebec's milk with many vitamins and minerals necessary to the maintenance of good health. From our farms to your family.

product.name: P'Tit Quebec Cheese
product.description: P'Tit Quebec mozarella cheese is the freshest cheese you can get in Quebec. Use it in the kitchen for some delicious pasta or for a simple snack for the kids.

product.name: Burnbrae Brown Eggs
product.description: Burnbrae Farms Brown Eggs are produced by Rhode Island Red hens. Although the nutritional value is the same as white eggs, some people swear they taste better; who are we to argue?

product.name: Burnbrae White Eggs
product.description: Naturegg Omega 3 is a nutritionally enhanced egg for people looking for natural foods with more essential nutrients. While all eggs are nutritious, natural and offer a great source of protein, vitamins and minerals, Naturegg Omega 3 eggs also provide an additional source of DHA omega-3 fatty acids.

product.name: Evian Water
product.description: Evian water is a brand of mineral water coming from sources near Évian-les-Bains, on the south shore of Lake Geneva.

product.name: Sprite
product.description: A colourless, lemon-lime beverage produced by the Coca-Cola Company.

product.name: Coca Cola
product.description: A carbonated soft drink originally made and intended as a patent medicine.

product.name: Fanta
product.description: An orange flavored carbonated soft drink created by Coca-Cola.

product.name: Fruit Punch
product.description: A combination made from real fruit creating a refreshing and delicious blend.

product.name: Orange Juice
product.description: A delectable and refreshing blend of 100% natural orange juices.

product.name: Monster Energy Drink
product.description: An energy drink made from taurine.

product.name: RedBull Energy Drink
product.description: RedBull is an energy that "Gives You Wings".
